question:
A friend you made while you studying abroad has writen to ask you 
help finding a in your country. You have heard about a job in a local 
company thd might be suitable for himm/her. 
Write a letter to this your letter 
• tell your friend about the job and what sort of work it involves 
• say why you think the job would be suitaue for him/her 
• explain how to apply gor the job
text: It's been a long while since our last chat. I remember the other time you asked me to notify you in case of any job opportunity in our city. Recently, a company announced a new job vacancy and I'd like to explain more to you.

Currently, the position is open for a senior software developer with more than five years of experience. Therefore, I recalled that you had a major in computer science, and you were working for a tech company as a senior web developer at the moment we met. Also, you have a very deep knowledge of scrum master and agile development which makes you an outstanding candidate. So, I think you fit very well in this job position and I recommend you to apply as soon as possible.

The application process is fairly easy, and you can send your CV and SOP via their website. After visiting the website, you would be able to see the career link on the top-right of the page which contains all the available information. However, if you encounter any issues don't hesitate to contact me. I hope to see you soon.
